meanings.definition: Experiencing or exhibiting excessive hunger or appetite.
meanings.sent1: The hyperphagic bear ate all the honey in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: She had a hyperphagic reaction to the delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The hyperphagic squirrel couldn't resist the temptation of the overflowing bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperphagic appetite was like a bottomless pit, always craving more.
meanings.sent5: The hyperphagic child's eyes lit up at the sight of the buffet spread before them.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive eating or overeating.
meanings.sent1: The hyperphagic cat always finished its food before the other pets.
meanings.sent2: The hyperphagic dog would beg for treats all day if allowed.
meanings.sent3: The hyperphagic hamster managed to stash away an impressive amount of food in its cheeks.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperphagic behavior at the party surprised everyone as she devoured the entire cake.
meanings.sent5: The hyperphagic raccoon raided the campsite's trash cans every night, leaving a mess behind.
